home.title: Rubieland - Dog daycare in Vendée
home.description: Welcome to Rubieland, the dog daycare in Vendée. Discover my services, my facilities and my commitment.

about.title: About Rubieland - Dog daycare in Vendée
about.description: Discover the story of Rubieland, a dog daycare in Vendée. Learn more about my mission, my values and my journey.

blog.title: Rubieland Blog - News from Rubieland daycare, stories and tips for dog care
blog.description: Discover practical tips on dog care, news about Rubieland and tips for taking care of your pet.

register.title: Registration at Rubieland - Sign up and book a place in dog daycare in Vendée
register.description: Create your account on Rubieland to access your personal space and make reservations for your dog(s).

login.title: Login to Rubieland - Access your personal space and book a place in dog daycare in Vendée
login.description: Log in to your Rubieland account to access your personal space and make reservations for your dog(s).

profile.title: Rubieland user profile - Manage your personal information and your dog daycare reservations in Vendée
profile.description: Access your Rubieland personal space to view your reservations, modify your information, manage your account and the profile(s) of your dog(s).
